name: image-classification-server
description: This application uses a TCP socket to receive a path of a image to analyze with the Yolo Object Detection System

scripts.postinstall: mkdir -p darknet-configs darknet-configs/cfg darknet-configs/data; wget -nc https://raw.githubusercontent.com/pjreddie/darknet/master/cfg/coco.data -O darknet-configs/cfg/coco.data; wget -nc https://raw.githubusercontent.com/pjreddie/darknet/master/cfg/yolov3.cfg -O darknet-configs/cfg/yolov3.cfg; wget -nc https://raw.githubusercontent.com/pjreddie/darknet/master/data/coco.names -O darknet-configs/data/coco.names; wget -nc https://pjreddie.com/media/files/yolov3.weights -O darknet-configs/yolov3.weights; true

author: Ricardo Maltez & RÃºben Caceiro
